webDesign.title: Website Development
webDesign.description: We create custom, high-performance websites tailored to your brand. From landing pages to complex corporate sites, we deliver responsive designs that convert visitors into customers.

features.0: Custom responsive design for all devices
features.2: Fast loading speeds with modern technologies

webDesign.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs

0.q: How long does it take to build a website?
0.a: Depending on complexity, a landing page takes 1-2 weeks, a business site 3-5 weeks, and enterprise solutions 6-12 weeks.

1.a: We help you set up hosting with reliable providers and can manage it for you as part of a maintenance plan.

2.q: Can I update the content myself?
2.a: Yes! We integrate a user-friendly CMS so you can easily update text, images, and blog posts without technical knowledge.

3.a: Absolutely. All our websites are fully responsive and tested across devices and browsers.

ecommerce.title: Online Store Development
ecommerce.description: Launch a powerful e-commerce store optimized for conversions. We build secure, fast, and scalable online shops that help you sell more.

0.q: Which payment gateways do you support?
0.a: We integrate with Stripe, PayPal, and local payment providers depending on your market.

1.q: Can I import products from another platform?
1.a: Yes, we can migrate your products, categories, and customer data from most e-commerce platforms.

2.a: We offer maintenance plans that include updates, security patches, and technical support.

3.a: Yes, we implement proper product schema, meta tags, sitemaps, and fast loading for optimal search rankings.

mobileApps.title: App Development
mobileApps.description: Build native and cross-platform mobile apps that delight users. From concept to App Store, we handle the entire development process.
mobileApps.pricingSubtitle: Bring your app idea to life

0.q: How long does app development take?
0.a: An MVP typically takes 2-3 months, a cross-platform app 4-6 months, and enterprise apps 6-12 months.

1.q: Do you handle App Store submissions?
1.a: Yes, we manage the entire submission process for both Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

2.q: Can you update my existing app?
2.a: Absolutely. We can redesign, add features, or optimize your existing mobile application.

3.a: We use React Native for cross-platform and Swift/Kotlin for native development.

googleAds.title: Google Ads
googleAds.description: Maximize your ROI with targeted Google Ads campaigns. We create, manage, and optimize campaigns that drive qualified traffic to your business.

features.1: Ad copy creation and A/B testing

googleAds.pricingSubtitle: Invest in growth with data-driven advertising

0.q: How quickly will I see results?
0.a: Google Ads can drive traffic immediately. Optimization for best ROI typically takes 2-4 weeks of data collection.

1.q: Is the ad spend included in the price?
1.a: No, the prices listed are for management. Ad spend is a separate budget you control.

2.q: Can you manage my existing campaigns?
2.a: Yes, we can audit and optimize your current Google Ads campaigns for better performance.

3.a: Yes, you receive detailed performance reports with metrics, insights, and recommendations.

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Climb to the top of search results with our comprehensive SEO strategies. We combine technical excellence with content optimization for lasting organic growth.
seoOptimization.pricingSubtitle: Long-term organic growth for your business

0.q: How long does SEO take to show results?
0.a: SEO is a long-term strategy. You can expect initial improvements in 3-6 months with significant results in 6-12 months.

1.q: Do you guarantee first page rankings?
1.a: We don't guarantee specific positions as search algorithms constantly change, but we use proven strategies to maximize your visibility.

2.a: Site speed optimization, mobile-friendliness, crawlability, structured data, HTTPS setup, and fixing broken links.

3.a: Yes, our Growth and Domination plans include professional content creation optimized for your target keywords.

googleMyBusiness.title: Google My Business
googleMyBusiness.description: Dominate local search and attract nearby customers. We optimize your Google Business Profile to increase visibility, reviews, and foot traffic.
googleMyBusiness.pricingSubtitle: Get found by customers near you

0.q: How does GMB help my business?
0.a: An optimized Google Business Profile increases your visibility in local searches and Google Maps, driving more calls and visits.

1.q: Can you help with negative reviews?
1.a: Yes, we provide review response strategies and help you encourage positive reviews from satisfied customers.

2.q: Do I need a physical address?
2.a: For most businesses, yes. Service-area businesses can hide their address while still appearing in local results.

3.q: How quickly will I see improvements?
3.a: Many businesses see increased visibility within 2-4 weeks after optimization.

socialNetworks.title: Social Networks
socialNetworks.description: Build a powerful social media presence that engages your audience. We handle strategy, content creation, and community management across all platforms.
socialNetworks.pricingSubtitle: Grow your brand on social media

0.a: We manage Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter/X, YouTube, and Pinterest.

1.a: Yes, we create all visual and written content aligned with your brand guidelines.

2.q: Can you run paid ads on social media?
2.a: Yes, our Growth and Domination plans include paid social advertising management.

3.a: We track engagement rate, follower growth, reach, website traffic from social, and conversions.

onlineReputation.title: Online Reputation
onlineReputation.description: Protect and enhance your brand's online image. We monitor, manage, and improve how your business appears across the internet.
onlineReputation.pricingSubtitle: Protect your most valuable asset — your reputation

0.a: We monitor Google reviews, social media mentions, news articles, forums, and review platforms relevant to your industry.

1.a: We can flag fraudulent or policy-violating reviews for removal and implement strategies to push down negative content.

2.q: How fast do you respond to mentions?
2.a: We aim to respond to critical mentions within 24 hours and routine mentions within 48 hours.

3.a: Yes, our Dominate plan includes a crisis communication strategy and rapid response protocols.

emailMarketing.title: E-mail Marketing
emailMarketing.description: Drive engagement and conversions with automated email campaigns. We create targeted sequences that nurture leads and retain customers.

0.q: Which email platforms do you use?
0.a: We work with Mailchimp, Klaviyo, ActiveCampaign, and other major email marketing platforms.

1.q: Can you migrate my existing email list?
1.a: Yes, we handle the complete migration of your subscriber lists and existing automation flows.

2.q: How do you handle GDPR compliance?
2.a: All our email campaigns are GDPR-compliant with proper consent management, unsubscribe options, and data handling.

3.q: What kind of ROI can I expect?
3.a: Email marketing typically delivers an ROI of $36-42 for every $1 spent, though results vary by industry.

restaurant.title: Restaurant & Hospitality Suite

medical.title: Medical & Wellness Platform

realestate.title: Real Estate Starter Kit
realestate.description: Property listing template with advanced search filters, virtual tour embeds, and agent profiles. IDX-ready.
